creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
dimension: 29 x 20 in. (73.66 x 50.8 cm) (sheet, as printed)
text: This artwork is part of the series COVID-19: Labor Camp Report. Artist's statement on this artwork originally published on the @laborcamp Instagram account: Whether it’s the virus, disease of racism, toxic lies, or criminal scheming: the Regime is, and always will be surrounded by the stench of death.
title: July 17, 2020: IT’S IN THE AIR!
